definition[0]: an honorary title, rank, or university degree is given to someone as an honour
example[0]: Brown received an honorary doctorate from Seoul University.
definition[1]: an honorary position in an organization is held without receiving any payment
definition[2]: an honorary member of a group is treated like a member of that group but does not belong to it
example[1]: They made him an honorary member of the club.
example[2]: She received an honorary doctorate from Harvard.
example[3]: The Honorary Secretary read the minutes of the previous meeting.
